message: Let's split it fairly, Bob. I'll take 60, you take 40.
I'll give you most of it, but I need some too!
That's not very specific, Bob. I'd like a more concrete offer.
Let's compromise, Bob. I'll take 55, you take 45. It's still a fair split.
I'll give you most of it, but I'm getting desperate!
I'm not sure I want to give you most of it, Bob. Here's a better offer: 50-50 split.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, Bob. 45 for me, 55 for you. Let's wrap this up!
